# init(title:resumeButton:)

**Initializer**

Creates a pause presentation with a resume button.

## Declaration

```swift
init(title: LocalizedStringResource, resumeButton: AlarmButton)
```

## Parameters

- **title**: The title of the paused UI.
- **resumeButton**: The required resume button for a paused timer.

## Creating a resume button

- **resumeButton**: The appearance of the resume button.
- **title**: The title of the paused UI.

items.description: The appearance of the resume button.
items.name: resumeButton

items.description: The title of the paused UI.
items.name: title

title: init(title:resumeButton:)
